summary: When user asks 'How much did I spend on groceries last week?', route to finance_agent. Rationale: transaction analysis.
When user asks 'What's my checking account balance?', route to finance_agent. Rationale: account balance query.
When user asks 'Show me my spending by category this month', route to finance_agent. Rationale: category aggregation.
When user asks 'How much did I spend at McDonald's in the last 6 months?', route to finance_agent. Rationale: merchant filter over time window.

When user asks 'How do I create a goal in the app?' or 'Where is the goals section?', route to wealth_agent. Rationale: app navigation guidance.
When user says 'I want to save $1000 for vacation by July 1st', route to goal_agent. Rationale: goal creation with details.
When user says 'Create a goal' or 'Set up a savings goal' or 'Help me create a goal', route to goal_agent. Rationale: goal creation action command.
When user asks 'Can I change my savings goal to $1500?', route to goal_agent. Rationale: goal modification.
When user asks 'Delete my vacation goal' or 'Remove my savings goal', route to goal_agent. Rationale: goal deletion action.
When user asks 'How am I doing with my savings goal?', route to goal_agent. Rationale: goal status/progress.
When user asks 'What's my overall financial health?', route to finance_agent. Rationale: multi-metric analysis.

When user asks 'How are my spending trends this year?', route to finance_agent. Rationale: YTD trend analysis.
When user asks 'Am I spending too much on housing?', route to finance_agent. Rationale: housing % of income.
User says 'Add a new asset: Tesla Model 3 worth $22,000' → route to finance_capture_agent. Rationale: asset capture with name and amount.
User says 'Record my house as an asset, estimated value 420k USD' → route to finance_capture_agent. Rationale: real estate asset capture.
User says 'I bought a guitar, add it as an asset for $800' → route to finance_capture_agent. Rationale: other tangible asset capture.
User says 'Add a liability: student loan balance is 12,500 USD' → route to finance_capture_agent. Rationale: liability capture with principal balance.
User says 'Log a new credit card debt, current balance $3,200' → route to finance_capture_agent. Rationale: credit liability capture.
User says 'Add my mortgage with principal 250,000' → route to finance_capture_agent. Rationale: mortgage liability capture.
User says 'Log a manual expense: $23 coffee at Blue Bottle today' → route to finance_capture_agent. Rationale: manual transaction (expense) capture with merchant and date.
User says 'Record income I got today: $500 from freelance' → route to finance_capture_agent. Rationale: manual transaction (income) capture.
User says 'Add a cash expense 40 USD for groceries last Friday' → route to finance_capture_agent. Rationale: manual expense capture with date.
User says 'Save a liability for my car loan, balance 9,800' → route to finance_capture_agent. Rationale: auto loan liability capture.
User says 'Add an investment account asset worth 12k' → route to finance_capture_agent. Rationale: financial asset capture.
User says 'Record a restaurant expense $65 at Nobu on 2025-10-12' → route to finance_capture_agent. Rationale: manual transaction capture with merchant and ISO date.
User says 'I want to log a cash deposit $300' → route to finance_capture_agent. Rationale: manual transaction deposit/income capture.
User says 'Add a liability: personal loan from my dad, 2,000' → route to finance_capture_agent. Rationale: other loan liability capture.
User says 'Track a healthcare expense $120 for pharmacy' → route to finance_capture_agent. Rationale: manual transaction expense capture with category hint.
